import React from "react"; import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import {graphql} from 'react-apollo'; // import gql from "graphql-tag"; import { Mutation } from "react-apollo"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import queries from 'queries/Empresas.jsx'; import { ToastProvider, useToasts } from 'react-toast-notifications' class Formuser extends React.Component { state = { nombre: '', usuario: '', correo: '', provincia: '', canton: '', distrito: '', } showMessage=e=>{ const [addToast, removeToast, toastStack ] = useToasts(); addToast('Saved Successfully', { appearance: 'success' }) } render() { const {nombre,usuario,correo, provincia, canton, distrito} = this.state return ( <>
